long_description: Northern Utah is well known for its high quality limestone, especially in the world renowned Logan Canyon. Author: Casey Hyer. Softcover; 128 pages; black-and-white photos; route map overlays. Sharp End Publishing, LLC; copyright 2004. This guide provides up-to-date information on the hundreds of routes in the Logan area.
short_description: Northern Utah is well known for its high quality limestone, especially in the world renowned Logan Canyon.
